divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my porch smoking. There was a blue flash in the sky as the streetlights went out. Another flash killed all the house lights except a select few houses still had power. By this time i was looking to the sky adn there was one more flash of blue as every hair on my body stood up like a static bomb been dropped and there was a streak through the sky from the point it took off there was a wider trail than in the direction it was going > like that it was a trail of emisson coming off from the light trail. At this time all the power came back on. then there was a plane that flew the same direction after the light. I knew the sound of the plane but the lights had no sounds jus flashes and a streak. This was at 2:22 AM on May 30 2012 Montgomery, WV.
Summary: blue flas of light streetlights went out followed by another flash houses lost power then another flash and streak across sky and everyhair on my body stood up from static as power came back on.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Montgomery
This sighting has never been favorited.
